judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.

parties: Karen A. FERRY, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Appellee, and Turkeyfoot Valley Area School District, Intervenor.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
LARSEN, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: William K. Eckel, Johnstown, for appellant.
Clifford F. Blaze, Deputy Chief Counsel, John E. Herzog, Asst. Counsel, Unemployment Compensation Bd. of Review, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
604 A.2d 1025
Karen A. FERRY, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Appellee, and Turkeyfoot Valley Area School District, Intervenor.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 9, 1992.
Decided April 16, 1992.
William K. Eckel, Johnstown, for appellant.
Clifford F. Blaze, Deputy Chief Counsel, John E. Herzog, Asst. Counsel, Unemployment Compensation Bd. of Review, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
